Articles.Content:
Hello, I am wondering if there has been or is any mods that give you a contract to launch satellites/probes or landers into space.

Something were you have to build a satellite using certain parts and launch it into a certain orbit and you earn money or something?

I was just wondering if there was anything close to this thank you
You might check here Contract Configurator http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604-0-90-Contract-Configurator-v0-6-1-2015-02-01
that's been integrated into the base game
